title: Statement by National Security Council Spokesperson Ned Price on the Terrorist Attack in Suruç, Turkey | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
July 20, 2015

 



Statement by National Security Council Spokesperson Ned Price on the Terrorist Attack in Suruç, Turkey





	The United States strongly condemns today’s heinous terrorist attack in Suruç, Turkey.  We extend our condolences to the families of the victims, many of whom had come to Suruç to assist reconstruction efforts in Kobani.  We also express our solidarity with the Turkish government and people and reaffirm our undeterred resolve to work with Turkey and other partners to combat the shared threat of terrorism.
